g.t: Shows familiarity with Good Michael outside what would be expected for officialities.
g.v: look you to the guard tonight; is not to be involved in the festivities.
Let's restrain ourselves to modest celebration; don't get drunk or anything (don't out-sport discretion).
g.t: doesn't want a conflict at this party.

v.t: Nevertheless, I'll personally look to it.
Iago is most honest. Here, honest means reliable, but the constant choice of honest over other words is definitely a literary technique.
Michael, good night. (I won't see you again until tomorrow.)
Tomorrow, ASAP, I'd like to talk to you.

g.v: We've married, but have yet to consummate our marriage (marriage's fruit).

v.t: We must go to the watch.

g.v: Not for another hour; it's not 10:00 yet.

We mustn't blame (?) because of that;
hasn't yet had sex with her, and she is sport for Jove.

g.t: has fallen into 's trap. can now tell that has been talking about like this and he can't deny it. Iago will spin it, of course. (?)

Indeed she is a most fresh (inexperienced / youthful) and delicate creature.
